IF (Trim (IF (Trim (C.UserString)='' OR C.sys.ErrorCode>0,'Error occured while connecting with Fusion system - '&IF (Trim (C.sys.ErrorDescription)<>'',Trim (C.sys.ErrorDescription),'NA'),IF (BlobSize (C.FusionResponse)>0,C.FusionResponse, StrToken (StrToken (C.UserString,2,'<faultstring>'),1,'</faultstring>'))))='',Trim (C.sys.LastErrorDescription),'LastErrorDescription is empty')
